My GulpWorkFlow

w/Bootstrap: Version 4.0.0

This Starter Pack includes the following:

  • Compiling and Bundling SCSS to CSS Files
  • Transpiling ES6 to ES5 Files
  • Image Minification
  • Handlebars Templating System
  • Gulp Build System

Will continue to improve on this Starter Pack

If your eyes are "round", apply a strip of paint from the inner corner of the eye to the outer (in this direction the line should expand), lash the eyelashes with black ink. Shadows at the inner corner of the eye narrowly, expanding them to the outer corner. Tint preparations for the eyelids choose gentle, pastel colors.
